favourite.article: We learned this song when my kids were very young in Houston. We sang it ALL the time. They are all in their thirties and they still remember it! Praise the Lord!
Good song! I sang this song once!
I love all Scripture songs, cause it makes Scripture memorization easier. But since I'm new to many songs, I'd like it if someone sang the lyrics. Thanks.
Amen. In our every daily living, God is our breath and He's ready to enter our lives. Praise our Lord He gave us an everlasting life.
...that the man of God may be complete, fully equipped for every good work.
We sang this song at the 7th and 8th grade conference in Oklahoma City this year. It was so living! We even sang it in the Oklahoma City Zoo!
I like the song because it builds up my character.
